ud5.4:1.2: ekam samayam bhagava savatthiyam viharati jetavane anathapindikassa arame.
ud5.4:1.3: Tena kho pana samayena sambahula kumaraka antara ca savatthim antara ca jetavanam macchake badhenti.
ud5.4:2.1: Atha kho bhagava pubbanhasamayam nivasetva pattacivaramadaya savatthim pindaya pavisi.
ud5.4:2.2: Addasa kho bhagava te sambahule kumarake antara ca savatthim antara ca jetavanam macchake badhente.
ud5.4:2.3: Disvana yena te kumaraka tenupasankami; upasankamitva te kumarake etadavoca:
ud5.4:2.4: “bhayatha vo, tumhe kumaraka, dukkhassa, appiyam vo dukkhan”ti?
ud5.4:2.5: “Evam, bhante, bhayama mayam, bhante, dukkhassa, appiyam no dukkhan”ti.
ud5.4:3.1: Atha kho bhagava etamattham viditva tayam velayam imam udanam udanesi:
